1228960.name: Harolds Harem: The Neckoning
1228960.description:
Harold's Harem: A Visual Novel Where Falling in Love is the Ultimate Mission Failure!

Want to save the dimension?: DON'T FALL IN LOVE!

Can you complete your top-secret mission and save the world before time runs out, without letting Harold steal your heart?

In this comedic visual novel that parodies dating sims, you’ll step into the boots of a new recruit in a highly specialized Love Infiltration Unit, tasked with preventing global disaster. Time is ticking, and your mission is clear—uncover Harold’s secrets before it’s too late. But beware: falling in love with Harold is a mission failure.

Alongside a squad of quirky comrades, you’ll navigate through hilarious conversations, risky battles, and a series of increasingly absurd choices that will lead you down unpredictable paths. Your decisions will determine the fate of the world—and whether you end up in Harold’s arms, or running for your life.

Can you save the world and keep your heart intact? Or will Harold's charm break through your defenses? There is only one way to find out!

Features:

  • Colorful characters – Each with their own personalities

  • Eight unique locations – Explore vivid pixel-art environments that bring the world to life.

  • Multiple routes and 4 unique endings – Your choices matter. Will you be the hero or the heartbroken?

  • Humorous dating sim parody – It’s a military operation, not a romance. Or is it...?

  • Pixel-art style – A charming, retro aesthetic to match the ridiculousness of the story.

One thing is for sure: DON'T FALL IN LOVE WITH HAROLD.
1228960.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
